title: Determine internal resistance of a battery

content.question: When a battery is connected to an external resistance R, as shown above on the left, there is a current I in the circuit. When the external resistance is changed to 3R, the current changes to I/2, as shown above on the right. What is the internal resistance r of the battery?

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
